basics.name: Franz Nikolaus Adam
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: Student at the University of Hawaii. Pursuing a B.S. in Computer Science, B.S. in Mathematics, Minor in Business. Expected Graduation: Spring 2022.

education.area: B.S. Computer Science, B.S. Mathematics, Minor Business

work.summary: Part Owner and founder of PlayerPlus Inc., an mobile medical record system add on for athletic trainers in U.S. college sports teams.

highlights: Maintaining and updating the Order, Supply and Shipment Database of MuvaTech.

work.summary: Undergraduate Tutor for ICS and Math courses

awards.title: CSCAA Scholar All-American
awards.summary: Achieving a grade point average of 3.50 or higher and competing at the respective NCAA swimming or diving championships.

awards.title: PACE Summer Start Up Launchpad Selection
awards.summary: My team's startup idea got selected for a research-grant and a 6 week long summer course, where we were taught and actively took the first steps in designing, shaping and launching our product.

awards.title: US Olympic Trials
awards.summary: Achieving the US Olympic Trial qualification time in the 50m Freestyle at the Toyota U.S. Open 2019 Atlanta, GA.

awards.title: 3x Dean's List
awards.summary: Placement on the Dean's List, by achieving a G.P.A. of 3.5 or higher.

awards.title: NCAA Championships
awards.summary: Qualification for the NCAA D1 Championships 2019 Austin, TX.

awards.title: National Champion
awards.summary: Austrian National Champion at the Austrian Nationals 2017 and 2018.

awards.title: Honoarable Mention
awards.summary: Honorable mention by my High School for my Final Project, Schlupflöcher in der allgemeinen Relativitätstheorie als möglicher weg zu Zeitreisen und Überlichtgeschwindigkeit, covering applications of the general theory of relativity for interstellar travels.

references.name: Dan Schemmel, Men's Head Coach at Stanford University.
Elliot Ptasnik, Men's Head Coach at University of Hawai'i at Manoa.
Nick Folker, Men's Athletic Coordinator at UC at Berkeley.
Dirk Lange, Former swimming head coach for Senior National Team Germany
